TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit StreamUpgradeAcceptor extends System.Object

Docs.summary: To implement a custom upgrade acceptor, inherited from this base class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An example of a stream upgrade is to build a compression stream directly on top of the transport stream.
This class is used with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider> to implement a custom stream upgrade.
For a detailed description of the upgrade process, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.IO.Stream AcceptUpgrade (System.IO.Stream stream);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IO.Stream AcceptUpgrade(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed
public: virtual System::IO::Stream ^ AcceptUpgrade(System::IO::Stream ^ stream);
abstract member AcceptUpgrade : System.IO.Stream -> System.IO.Stream override this.AcceptUpgrade : System.IO.Stream -> System.IO.Stream

Docs.summary: Upgrades the transport stream and returns the upgraded stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method can be used to wrap the existing transport stream by providing additional capabilities; for example, a compressing stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract IAsyncResult BeginAcceptUpgrade (System.IO.Stream stream, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginAcceptUpgrade(class System.IO.Stream stream, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
public: abstract IAsyncResult ^ BeginAcceptUpgrade(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);
abstract member BeginAcceptUpgrade : System.IO.Stream * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

Docs.param: The method to be called when the call has completed.
Docs.returns: Returns a result code that is passed into EndAcceptUpgrade to access the upgraded stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see the remarks for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>.

abstract member CanUpgrade : string -> bool

Docs.param: The type of content to be checked.
Docs.summary: Determines whether the upgrade requested is supported by this upgrade acceptor.
Docs.returns: if this kind of upgrade is supported; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The developer can inspect the requested content type and determine whether the resulting upgrade can be performed by this upgrade acceptor. This content type comes from the `GetNextUpgrade` method on the matching upgrade initiator.
